featured.text: The native greeted the travelers in a language which was strange to them.
The next day she met another traveler who was hungry.
While offering budget-conscious travelers a unique option, capsule hotels may not be suitable for everyone.
Instead of the traditional bare pod-sized style, new chains now feature interior design that appeals to digitally connected travelers from around the world.

other.text: When the hungry traveler saw the precious stone, he asked her to give it to him.
A few hours later, 18 traveler came down the road.
A great disaster for the travelers.
A traveler who suffers from jet lag has problems in ___________.
The wise woman generously opened her bag to 21 her food with the traveler.

definition.en_def: A person who is traveling or who travels frequently.
definition.example: The traveler packed her bags and headed to the airport.
